title: We've Seen Things You People Wouldn't Believe Edition
description:
Stephen Metcalf, Dana Stevens and Isaac Butler discuss Denis Villeneuve's Blade Runner 2049, catch up on Amazon's streaming hit Transparent, and discuss the sexual assault allegations against Hollywood super-producer Harvey Weinstein. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
